<li id="cite_note-HuberMesa-130"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-HuberMesa_130-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-HuberMesa_130-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-HuberMesa_130-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-HuberMesa_130-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFHuber2018" class="citation journal cs1">Huber, B.A. (2018). "The South American spider genera <i>Mesabolivar</i> and <i>Carapoia</i> (Araneae, Pholcidae): new species and a framework for redrawing generic limits". <i>Zootaxa</i>. <b>4395</b> (1): <span class="nowrap">1–</span>178. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.11646%2Fzootaxa.4395.1.1">10.11646/zootaxa.4395.1.1</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29690343">29690343</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Zootaxa&amp;rft.atitle=The+South+American+spider+genera+Mesabolivar+and+Carapoia+%28Araneae%2C+Pholcidae%29%3A+new+species+and+a+framework+for+redrawing+generic+limits&amp;rft.volume=4395&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E1-%3C%2Fspan%3E178&amp;rft.date=2018&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.11646%2Fzootaxa.4395.1.1&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F29690343&amp;rft.aulast=Huber&amp;rft.aufirst=B.A.&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-138"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-138" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFMeregalliBorovecCervellaSantovito2021" class="citation journal cs1">Meregalli, M.; Borovec, R.; Cervella, P.; Santovito, A.; Toševski, I.; Ottati, S.; Nakládal, O. (6 January 2021). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1093/zoolinnean/zlaa142">"The Namaini, a new weevil tribe with six new genera from South Africa (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae)"</a>. <i>Zool. Soc</i>. <b>193</b> (zlaa142): <span class="nowrap">95–</span>123. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1093%2Fzoolinnean%2Fzlaa142">10.1093/zoolinnean/zlaa142</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hdl_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Hdl (identifier)">hdl</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://hdl.handle.net/2318%2F1771217">2318/1771217</a></span>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISSN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISSN (identifier)">ISSN</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://search.worldcat.org/issn/0024-4082">0024-4082</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Zool.+J.+Linn.+Soc.&amp;rft.atitle=The+Namaini%2C+a+new+weevil+tribe+with+six+new+genera+from+South+Africa+%28Coleoptera%3A+Curculionidae%3A+Entiminae%29&amp;rft.volume=193&amp;rft.issue=zlaa142&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E95-%3C%2Fspan%3E123&amp;rft.date=2021-01-06&amp;rft_id=info%3Ahdl%2F2318%2F1771217&amp;rft.issn=0024-4082&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1093%2Fzoolinnean%2Fzlaa142&amp;rft.aulast=Meregalli&amp;rft.aufirst=M.&amp;rft.au=Borovec%2C+R.&amp;rft.au=Cervella%2C+P.&amp;rft.au=Santovito%2C+A.&amp;rft.au=To%C5%A1evski%2C+I.&amp;rft.au=Ottati%2C+S.&amp;rft.au=Nakl%C3%A1dal%2C+O.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.1093%2Fzoolinnean%2Fzlaa142&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-KingSpain-143"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-KingSpain_143-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-KingSpain_143-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFOrteaEspinosa1998" class="citation journal cs1 cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source">Ortea, J.; Espinosa, José (1998). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.biodiversitylibrary.org/page/44271290">"Dos

en los subarchipiélagos Jardines de Rey y Jardines de la Reina, 
descritas en honor de los Reyes de España por su primera visita a Cuba 
[Two new species of marine mollusks (Mollusca: Gastropoda) collected in 
the subarchipelagos Jardines del Rey and Jardines de la Reina, described

<li id="cite_note-147"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-147" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFDavieNg2013" class="citation journal cs1">Davie, P.J.F.; Ng, P.K.L. <li id="cite_note-148"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-148" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFSchubartNg2020" class="citation journal cs1">Schubart, C.B.; Ng, P.K.L. (2020). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://lkcnhm.nus.edu.sg/wp-content/uploads/sites/10/2020/12/RBZ-2020-0097.pdf">"Revision of the intertidal and semiterrestrial crab genera <i>Chiromantes</i> Gistel, 1848, and <i>Pseudosesarma</i>
 Serène &amp; Soh, 1970 (Crustacea: Brachyura: Sesarmidae), using 
morphology and molecular phylogenetics, with the establishment of nine 
new genera and two new species"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <i>Raffles Bull. Zool</i>. <b>68</b> (452): <span class="nowrap">891–</span>994. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.26107%2FRBZ-2020-0097">10.26107/RBZ-2020-0097</a></span><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">26 May</span> 2021</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Raffles+Bull.+Zool.&amp;rft.atitle=Revision+of+the+intertidal+and+semiterrestrial+crab+genera+Chiromantes+Gistel%2C+1848%2C+and+Pseudosesarma+Ser%C3%A8ne+%26+Soh%2C+1970+%28Crustacea%3A+Brachyura%3A+Sesarmidae%29%2C+using+morphology+and+molecular+phylogenetics%2C+with+the+establishment+of+nine+new+genera+and+two+new+species&amp;rft.volume=68&amp;rft.issue=452&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E891-%3C%2Fspan%3E994&amp;rft.date=2020&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.26107%2FRBZ-2020-0097&amp;rft.aulast=Schubart&amp;rft.aufirst=C.B.&amp;rft.au=Ng%2C+P.K.L.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Flkcnhm.nus.edu.sg%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2Fsites%2F10%2F2020%2F12%2FRBZ-2020-0097.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-FBG2018-158"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-FBG2018_158-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFFreyhofBayçelebiGeiger2018" class="citation journal cs1">Freyhof, J.; Bayçelebi, E.; Geiger, M. (2018). "Review of the genus <i>Cobitis</i> in the Middle East, with the description of eight new species (Teleostei: Cobitidae)". <i>Zootaxa</i>. <b>4535</b> (1): <span class="nowrap">1–</span>75. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.11646%2Fzootaxa.4535.1.1">10.11646/zootaxa.4535.1.1</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30647339">30647339</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Zootaxa&amp;rft.atitle=Review+of+the+genus+Cobitis+in+the+Middle+East%2C+with+the+description+of+eight+new+species+%28Teleostei%3A+Cobitidae%29&amp;rft.volume=4535&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E1-%3C%2Fspan%3E75&amp;rft.date=2018&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.11646%2Fzootaxa.4535.1.1&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F30647339&amp;rft.aulast=Freyhof&amp;rft.aufirst=J.&amp;rft.au=Bay%C3%A7elebi%2C+E.&amp;rft.au=Geiger%2C+M.&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-166"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-166" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFFerreiraRodriguesCunhaDomingues2017" class="citation journal cs1">Ferreira,

</li>
<li id="cite_note-167"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-167" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFEspinosaOrtea2005" class="citation journal cs1 cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source">Espinosa, J.; Ortea, J. </li>
<li id="cite_note-177"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-177" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFEbersoleEhret2018" class="citation journal cs1">Ebersole, J.A.; Ehret, D.J. (2018). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5764036">"A new species of <i>Cretalamna sensu stricto</i> (Lamniformes, Otodontidae) from the Late Cretaceous (Santonian-Campanian) of Alabama, USA"</a>. <i>PeerJ</i>. <b>6</b>: e4229. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.7717%2Fpeerj.4229">10.7717/peerj.4229</a></span>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMC_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMC (identifier)">PMC</a>&nbsp;<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5764036">5764036</a></span>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29333348">29333348</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=PeerJ&amp;rft.atitle=A+new+species+of+Cretalamna+sensu+stricto+%28Lamniformes%2C+Otodontidae%29+from+the+Late+Cretaceous+%28Santonian-Campanian%29+of+Alabama%2C+USA&amp;rft.volume=6&amp;rft.pages=e4229&amp;rft.date=2018&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC5764036%23id-name%3DPMC&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F29333348&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.7717%2Fpeerj.4229&amp;rft.aulast=Ebersole&amp;rft.aufirst=J.A.&amp;rft.au=Ehret%2C+D.J.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC5764036&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-Cuspicephalus-187"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Cuspicephalus_187-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFMartillEtches2013" class="citation journal cs1">Martill, David M. &amp; Etches, Steve (2013). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.4202%2Fapp.2011.0071">"A new monofenestratan pterosaur from the Kimmeridge Clay Formation (Upper Jurassic, Kimmeridgian) of Dorset, England"</a>. <i>Acta Palaeontologica Polonica</i>. <b>58</b> (2): <span class="nowrap">285–</span>294. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.4202%2Fapp.2011.0071">10.4202/app.2011.0071</a></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Acta+Palaeontologica+Polonica&amp;rft.atitle=A+new+monofenestratan+pterosaur+from+the+Kimmeridge+Clay+Formation+%28Upper+Jurassic%2C+Kimmeridgian%29+of+Dorset%2C+England&amp;rft.volume=58&amp;rft.issue=2&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E285-%3C%2Fspan%3E294&amp;rft.date=2013&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.4202%2Fapp.2011.0071&amp;rft.aulast=Martill&amp;rft.aufirst=David+M.&amp;rft.au=Etches%2C+Steve&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.4202%252Fapp.2011.0071&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-Sole2021-189"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Sole2021_189-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Sole2021_189-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFSoléMorloSchaalLehmann2021" class="citation journal cs1 cs1-prop-long-vol">Solé
 F, Morlo M, Schaal T, Lehmann T (2021). "New hyaenodonts (Mammalia) 
from the late Ypresian locality of Prémontré (France) support a 
radiation of the hyaenodonts in Europe already at the end of the early 
Eocene". <i>Geobios</i>. <span class="nowrap">66–</span>67: <span class="nowrap">119–</span>141. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bibcode_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Bibcode (identifier)">Bibcode</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2021Geobi..66..119S">2021Geobi..66..119S</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1016%2Fj.geobios.2021.02.004">10.1016/j.geobios.2021.02.004</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISSN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISSN (identifier)">ISSN</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://search.worldcat.org/issn/0016-6995">0016-6995</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:234848856">234848856</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Geobios&amp;rft.atitle=New+hyaenodonts+%28Mammalia%29+from+the+late+Ypresian+locality+of+Pr%C3%A9montr%C3%A9+%28France%29+support+a+radiation+of+the+hyaenodonts+in+Europe+already+at+the+end+of+the+early+Eocene&amp;rft.volume=66%E2%80%9367&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E119-%3C%2Fspan%3E141&amp;rft.date=2021&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1016%2Fj.geobios.2021.02.004&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A234848856%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft.issn=0016-6995&amp;rft_id=info%3Abibcode%2F2021Geobi..66..119S&amp;rft.aulast=Sol%C3%A9&amp;rft.aufirst=F&amp;rft.au=Morlo%2C+M&amp;rft.au=Schaal%2C+T&amp;rft.au=Lehmann%2C+T&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-Crinus2017-194"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Crinus2017_194-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFColeAusichColmenarZamora2017" class="citation journal cs1">Cole, S.; Ausich, W.; Colmenar, J.; Zamora, S. (2017). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1017%2Fjpa.2016.135">"Filling

 the Castillejo and Fombuena formations (Middle and Upper Ordovician, 
Iberian Chains, Spain)"</a>. <i>Journal of Paleontology</i>. <b>91</b> (4): <span class="nowrap">715–</span>734. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bibcode_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Bibcode (identifier)">Bibcode</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2017JPal...91..715C">2017JPal...91..715C</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1017%2Fjpa.2016.135">10.1017/jpa.2016.135</a></span>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hdl_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Hdl (identifier)">hdl</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://hdl.handle.net/20.500.12468%2F565">20.500.12468/565</a></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Journal+of+Paleontology&amp;rft.atitle=Filling+the+Gondwanan+gap%3A+Paleobiogeographic+implications+of+new+crinoids+from+the+Castillejo+and+Fombuena+formations+%28Middle+and+Upper+Ordovician%2C+Iberian+Chains%2C+Spain%29&amp;rft.volume=91&amp;rft.issue=4&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E715-%3C%2Fspan%3E734&amp;rft.date=2017&amp;rft_id=info%3Ahdl%2F20.500.12468%2F565&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1017%2Fjpa.2016.135&amp;rft_id=info%3Abibcode%2F2017JPal...91..715C&amp;rft.aulast=Cole&amp;rft.aufirst=S.&amp;rft.au=Ausich%2C+W.&amp;rft.au=Colmenar%2C+J.&amp;rft.au=Zamora%2C+S.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.1017%252Fjpa.2016.135&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-195"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-195" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFRobinsonLiYeates2020" class="citation journal cs1">Robinson, Isabella J.; Li, Xuankun; Yeates, David K. (16 April 2020). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1111/aen.12465">"Revision
 of the endemic Australian robber fly genus Daptolestes Hull, 1962 
(Diptera: Asilidae) and description of Humorolethalis gen. nov"</a>. <i>Austral Entomology</i>. <b>59</b> (3): <span class="nowrap">487–</span>504. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1111%2Faen.12465">10.1111/aen.12465</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:221464174">221464174</a> – via Wiley Online Library.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Austral+Entomology&amp;rft.atitle=Revision+of+the+endemic+Australian+robber+fly+genus+Daptolestes+Hull%2C+1962+%28Diptera%3A+Asilidae%29+and+description+of+Humorolethalis+gen.+nov.&amp;rft.volume=59&amp;rft.issue=3&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E487-%3C%2Fspan%3E504&amp;rft.date=2020-04-16&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1111%2Faen.12465&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A221464174%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft.aulast=Robinson&amp;rft.aufirst=Isabella+J.&amp;rft.au=Li%2C+Xuankun&amp;rft.au=Yeates%2C+David+K.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fonlinelibrary.wiley.com%2Fdoi%2Fabs%2F10.1111%2Faen.12465&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-Daviesia-198"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Daviesia_198-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Daviesia_198-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFMichael_D._CrispLindy_CayzerGregory_T._ChandlerLyn_G._Cook2017" class="citation journal cs1"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Crisp" title="Michael Crisp">Michael D. <li id="cite_note-Ibexaspis2018-199"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Ibexaspis2018_199-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Ibexaspis2018_199-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFMcadamsAdrainKarim2018" class="citation journal cs1">Mcadams

<li id="cite_note-204"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-204" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFJungferReichlePiskurek2010" class="citation journal cs1">Jungfer, K.-H.; Reichle, S.; Piskurek, O. (2010). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.salamandra-journal.com/index.php/contents/2010-vol-46/222-jungfer-k-h-s-reichle-o-piskurek/file">"Description of a new cryptic southwestern Amazonian species of leaf-gluing treefrog, genus <i>Dendropsophus</i> (Amphibia: Anura: Hylidae)"</a>. <i>Salamandra</i>. <b>46</b> (4): <span class="nowrap">204–</span>213.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Salamandra&amp;rft.atitle=Description+of+a+new+cryptic+southwestern+Amazonian+species+of+leaf-gluing+treefrog%2C+genus+Dendropsophus+%28Amphibia%3A+Anura%3A+Hylidae%29&amp;rft.volume=46&amp;rft.issue=4&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E204-%3C%2Fspan%3E213&amp;rft.date=2010&amp;rft.aulast=Jungfer&amp;rft.aufirst=K.-H.&amp;rft.au=Reichle%2C+S.&amp;rft.au=Piskurek%2C+O.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.salamandra-journal.com%2Findex.php%2Fcontents%2F2010-vol-46%2F222-jungfer-k-h-s-reichle-o-piskurek%2Ffile&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-205"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-205" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFBaehrRavenHarms2017" class="citation journal cs1">Baehr, Barbara C.; Raven, Robert; Harms, Danilo (2017). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.3897%2Fevolsyst.1.15735">"<span class="cs1-kern-left"></span>"High Tide or Low Tide": <i>Desis bobmarleyi</i> sp. n., a new spider from coral reefs in Australia's Sunshine State and its relative from Sāmoa (Araneae, Desidae, <i>Desis</i>)"</a>. <i>Evolutionary Systematics</i>. <b>1</b> (1): <span class="nowrap">111–</span>120. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.3897%2Fevolsyst.1.15735">10.3897/evolsyst.1.15735</a></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Evolutionary+Systematics&amp;rft.atitle=%22High+Tide+or+Low+Tide%22%3A+Desis+bobmarleyi+sp.+n.%2C+a+new+spider+from+coral+reefs+in+Australia%27s+Sunshine+State+and+its+relative+from+S%C4%81moa+%28Araneae%2C+Desidae%2C+Desis%29&amp;rft.volume=1&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E111-%3C%2Fspan%3E120&amp;rft.date=2017&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.3897%2Fevolsyst.1.15735&amp;rft.aulast=Baehr&amp;rft.aufirst=Barbara+C.&amp;rft.au=Raven%2C+Robert&amp;rft.au=Harms%2C+Danilo&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.3897%252Fevolsyst.1.15735&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-RavenHebron-212"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-RavenHebron_212-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-RavenHebron_212-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFRavenHebron2018" class="citation journal cs1">Raven, R. <li id="cite_note-223"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-223" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFMcCabeDoderoSimpson2016" class="citation journal cs1">McCabe, S. <li id="cite_note-RollingStoneflies-227"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-RollingStoneflies_227-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-RollingStoneflies_227-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-RollingStoneflies_227-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-RollingStoneflies_227-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-RollingStoneflies_227-4"><sup><i><b>e</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-RollingStoneflies_227-5"><sup><i><b>f</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-RollingStoneflies_227-6"><sup><i><b>g</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-RollingStoneflies_227-7"><sup><i><b>h</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-RollingStoneflies_227-8"><sup><i><b>i</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFSrokaStaniczekKondratieff2018" class="citation journal cs1">Sroka, Pavel; Staniczek, Arnold H.; Kondratieff, Boris C. <li id="cite_note-242"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-242" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFBramantiBramantiRukmane-Bārbale2020" class="citation journal cs1">Bramanti, A.; Bramanti, A.; Rukmane-Bārbale, A. Daugavp</i>. <b>20</b> (2): <span class="nowrap">147–</span>153.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Acta+Biol.+Univ.+Daugavp.&amp;rft.atitle=Two+new+species+of+the+genus+Eupyrgops+Berg%2C+1898+%28Coleoptera%3A+Curculionidae%3A+Celeuthetini%29+from+the+Luzon+island+%28Philippines%29&amp;rft.volume=20&amp;rft.issue=2&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E147-%3C%2Fspan%3E153&amp;rft.date=2020&amp;rft.aulast=Bramanti&amp;rft.aufirst=A.&amp;rft.au=Bramanti%2C+A.&amp;rft.au=Rukmane-B%C4%81rbale%2C+A.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fdu.lv%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F03%2FBramanti2020_2.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-Brennan1962-250"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Brennan1962_250-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Brennan1962_250-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Brennan1962_250-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Brennan1962_250-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFBrennan1962" class="citation journal cs1">Brennan, J. <li id="cite_note-251"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-251" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFHaddadWesołowska2011" class="citation journal cs1">Haddad, Charles R.; <li id="cite_note-252"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-252" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFRheims2022" class="citation journal cs1">Rheims, C.A. (2022). "New species and records of the genus <i>Extraordinarius</i> Rheims, 2019 (Araneae: Sparassidae: Sparianthinae)". <i>Zootaxa</i>. <b>5205</b> (2): <span class="nowrap">190–</span>200. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.11646%2Fzootaxa.5205.2.6">10.11646/zootaxa.5205.2.6</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/37045437">37045437</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Zootaxa&amp;rft.atitle=New+species+and+records+of+the+genus+Extraordinarius+Rheims%2C+2019+%28Araneae%3A+Sparassidae%3A+Sparianthinae%29&amp;rft.volume=5205&amp;rft.issue=2&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E190-%3C%2Fspan%3E200&amp;rft.date=2022&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.11646%2Fzootaxa.5205.2.6&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F37045437&amp;rft.aulast=Rheims&amp;rft.aufirst=C.A.&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-261"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-261" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFCepedaSánchezPardos2019" class="citation journal cs1">Cepeda, D.; Sánchez, N.; Pardos, F. Biodiv</i>. <b>49</b> (5): <span class="nowrap">2281–</span>2309. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bibcode_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Bibcode (identifier)">Bibcode</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2019MarBd..49.2281C">2019MarBd..49.2281C</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1007%2Fs12526-019-00963-x">10.1007/s12526-019-00963-x</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:195791218">195791218</a> – via ResearchGate.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Mar.+Biodiv.&amp;rft.atitle=First+extensive+account+of+the+phylum+Kinorhyncha+from+Haiti+and+the+Dominican+Republic+%28Caribbean+Sea%29%2C+with+the+description+of+four+new+species&amp;rft.volume=49&amp;rft.issue=5&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E2281-%3C%2Fspan%3E2309&amp;rft.date=2019&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A195791218%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1007%2Fs12526-019-00963-x&amp;rft_id=info%3Abibcode%2F2019MarBd..49.2281C&amp;rft.aulast=Cepeda&amp;rft.aufirst=D.&amp;rft.au=S%C3%A1nchez%2C+N.&amp;rft.au=Pardos%2C+F.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.researchgate.net%2Fpublication%2F334217363&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-270"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-270" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFEspinosaOrtea2013" class="citation journal cs1 cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source">Espinosa, J.; Ortea, J. (2013). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20200713161115/https://mdc.ulpgc.es/cdm/ref/collection/racc/id/356">"Nuevas
 especies de los géneros Dentimargo Cossmann, 1899 y Eratoidea 
Weinkauff, 1879, y nuevo género de marginélido de la isla de la 
Guadeloupe, Antillas Menores, Mar Caribe (Mollusca: Neogastropoda: 
Marginellidae)"</a>. <i>Revista de la Academia Canaria de Ciencias</i> (in Spanish). <b>25</b>: <span class="nowrap">111–</span>127. Archived from <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://mdc.ulpgc.es/cdm/ref/collection/racc/id/356">the original</a> on 13 July 2020<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">13 May</span> 2022</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Revista+de+la+Academia+Canaria+de+Ciencias&amp;rft.atitle=Nuevas+especies+de+los+g%C3%A9neros+Dentimargo+Cossmann%2C+1899+y+Eratoidea+Weinkauff%2C+1879%2C+y+nuevo+g%C3%A9nero+de+margin%C3%A9lido+de+la+isla+de+la+Guadeloupe%2C+Antillas+Menores%2C+Mar+Caribe+%28Mollusca%3A+Neogastropoda%3A+Marginellidae%29&amp;rft.volume=25&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E111-%3C%2Fspan%3E127&amp;rft.date=2013&amp;rft.aulast=Espinosa&amp;rft.aufirst=J.&amp;rft.au=Ortea%2C+J.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fmdc.ulpgc.es%2Fcdm%2Fref%2Fcollection%2Fracc%2Fid%2F356&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>

(2015). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.researchgate.net/publication/293313877">"Descripción de 21 especies de <i>Gibberula</i> Swainson, 1840 (Mollusca: Gastropoda: Cystiscidae) en honor de 21 mujeres distinguidas con el Premio Príncipe de Asturias"</a>. <i>Rev. <li id="cite_note-281"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-281" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFZamaniMarusik2020" class="citation journal cs1">Zamani, A.; Marusik, Y. <li id="cite_note-288"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-288" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFSilveiraLimaFonsecaMcHugh2022" class="citation journal cs1">Silveira, L.F.L.d.; Lima, W.; Fonseca, C.R.V.d.; McHugh, J. <li id="cite_note-Heckethornia-290"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Heckethornia_290-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFMcAdamsAdrain2009" class="citation journal cs1">McAdams, N.E.B.; Adrain, J.M. (2009). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://myweb.uiowa.edu/jadrain/resources/McAdamsAdrain-2009b.pdf">"<i>Heckethornia</i>,
 a new genus of dimeropygid trilobites from the Lower Ordovician 
(Ibexian; Tulean and Blackhillsian) of the Great Basin, western USA"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <i>Canadian Journal of Earth Sciences</i>. <b>46</b> (12): <span class="nowrap">875–</span>914. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bibcode_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Bibcode (identifier)">Bibcode</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2009CaJES..46..875M">2009CaJES..46..875M</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1139%2FE09-060">10.1139/E09-060</a><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">14 April</span> 2021</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Canadian+Journal+of+Earth+Sciences&amp;rft.atitle=Heckethornia%2C+a+new+genus+of+dimeropygid+trilobites+from+the+Lower+Ordovician+%28Ibexian%3B+Tulean+and+Blackhillsian%29+of+the+Great+Basin%2C+western+USA&amp;rft.volume=46&amp;rft.issue=12&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E875-%3C%2Fspan%3E914&amp;rft.date=2009&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1139%2FE09-060&amp;rft_id=info%3Abibcode%2F2009CaJES..46..875M&amp;rft.aulast=McAdams&amp;rft.aufirst=N.E.B.&amp;rft.au=Adrain%2C+J.M.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fmyweb.uiowa.edu%2Fjadrain%2Fresources%2FMcAdamsAdrain-2009b.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-Whitmore11-300"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Whitmore11_300-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Whitmore11_300-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFWhitmore2011" class="citation journal cs1">Whitmore, D. <li id="cite_note-Hydraena2011-310"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Hydraena2011_310-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFPerkins2011" class="citation journal cs1">Perkins, P. <li id="cite_note-Hydroptila14-311"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Hydroptila14_311-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Hydroptila14_311-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Hydroptila14_311-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFSouzaSantosTakiya2014" class="citation journal cs1">Souza, W. R. M.; Santos, A. P. M.; Takiya, D. M. (2014). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1590%2FS1984-46702014000600010">"Three new species of Hydroptila (Trichoptera: Hydroptilidae) from Northeastern Brazil"</a>. <i>Zoologia (Curitiba)</i>. <b>31</b> (6): <span class="nowrap">639–</span>643. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1590%2FS1984-46702014000600010">10.1590/S1984-46702014000600010</a></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Zoologia+%28Curitiba%29&amp;rft.atitle=Three+new+species+of+Hydroptila+%28Trichoptera%3A+Hydroptilidae%29+from+Northeastern+Brazil&amp;rft.volume=31&amp;rft.issue=6&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E639-%3C%2Fspan%3E643&amp;rft.date=2014&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1590%2FS1984-46702014000600010&amp;rft.aulast=Souza&amp;rft.aufirst=W.+R.+M.&amp;rft.au=Santos%2C+A.+P.+M.&amp;rft.au=Takiya%2C+D.+M.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.1590%252FS1984-46702014000600010&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-312"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-312" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFMaierIvieJohnsonMaddison2010" class="citation journal cs1">Maier,

</li>

<li id="cite_note-Silurian1998-317"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Silurian1998_317-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Silurian1998_317-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Silurian1998_317-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Silurian1998_317-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFAdrain1998" class="citation journal cs1">Adrain,

with Species from the Silurian of Arctic Canada". <i>Journal of Paleontology</i>. <b>72</b> (4): <span class="nowrap">698–</span>718. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1017%2FS0022336000040403">10.1017/S0022336000040403</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JSTOR_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="JSTOR (identifier)">JSTOR</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.jstor.org/stable/1306696">1306696</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:88816525">88816525</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Journal+of+Paleontology&amp;rft.atitle=Systematics+of+the+Acanthoparyphinae+%28Trilobita%29%2C+with+Species+from+the+Silurian+of+Arctic+Canada&amp;rft.volume=72&amp;rft.issue=4&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E698-%3C%2Fspan%3E718&amp;rft.date=1998&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A88816525%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jstor.org%2Fstable%2F1306696%23id-name%3DJSTOR&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1017%2FS0022336000040403&amp;rft.aulast=Adrain&amp;rft.aufirst=Jonathan+M.&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-318"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-318" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFMartínezCeccarelliZaldivar-Riverón2010" class="citation journal cs1">Martínez, J. <li id="cite_note-Adrain2003-319"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Adrain2003_319-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Adrain2003_319-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFAdrainLeeWestropChatterton2003" class="citation journal cs1">Adrain, Jonathan M.; Lee, Dong-Chan; Westrop, Stephen R.; Chatterton, Brian D.E.; Landing, Ed (2003). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.researchgate.net/publication/289885344">"Classification

nov., with new genera from the Lower Ordovician (Ibexian) of Idaho and 
Utah"</a>. <i>Memoirs of the Queensland Museum</i>. <b>48</b> (2): <span class="nowrap">553–</span>586<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">14 April</span> 2021</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Memoirs+of+the+Queensland+Museum&amp;rft.atitle=Classification+of+the+trilobite+subfamilies+Hystricurinae+and+Hintzecurinae+subfam.+nov.%2C+with+new+genera+from+the+Lower+Ordovician+%28Ibexian%29+of+Idaho+and+Utah&amp;rft.volume=48&amp;rft.issue=2&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E553-%3C%2Fspan%3E586&amp;rft.date=2003&amp;rft.aulast=Adrain&amp;rft.aufirst=Jonathan+M.&amp;rft.au=Lee%2C+Dong-Chan&amp;rft.au=Westrop%2C+Stephen+R.&amp;rft.au=Chatterton%2C+Brian+D.E.&amp;rft.au=Landing%2C+Ed&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.researchgate.net%2Fpublication%2F289885344&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-320"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-320" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFBrannochSvenson2016" class="citation journal cs1">Brannoch, S. K.; Svenson, G. J. <li id="cite_note-331"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-331" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFRichardGraberKropf2016" class="citation journal cs1">Richard M, Graber W, Kropf C (August 2016). <li id="cite_note-332"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-332" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFMillerGunnellGawadHamdan2014" class="citation journal cs1">Miller, E. <li id="cite_note-Spumellaria2007-340"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Spumellaria2007_340-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Spumellaria2007_340-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Spumellaria2007_340-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Spumellaria2007_340-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Spumellaria2007_340-4"><sup><i><b>e</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Spumellaria2007_340-5"><sup><i><b>f</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Spumellaria2007_340-6"><sup><i><b>g</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFKozurMoixOzsvártP2007" class="citation journal cs1">Kozur HW, Moix P, Ozsvárt, P (2007). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.researchgate.net/publication/235412152">"Stratigraphically

<li id="cite_note-341"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-341" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFSinghWoodMhatreVenkateswaran2019" class="citation journal cs1">Singh
 NK, Wood JM, Mhatre SS, Venkateswaran K (2019). "Metagenome to phenome 
approach enables isolation and genomics characterization of <i>Kalamiella piersonii</i> gen. nov., sp. nov. from the International Space Station". <i>Appl. Microbiol. Biotechnol</i>. <b>103</b> (11): <span class="nowrap">4483–</span>4497. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1007%2Fs00253-019-09813-z">10.1007/s00253-019-09813-z</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31011775">31011775</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:126417351">126417351</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Appl.+Microbiol.+Biotechnol.&amp;rft.atitle=Metagenome+to+phenome+approach+enables+isolation+and+genomics+characterization+of+Kalamiella+piersonii+gen.+nov.%2C+sp.+nov.+from+the+International+Space+Station&amp;rft.volume=103&amp;rft.issue=11&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E4483-%3C%2Fspan%3E4497&amp;rft.date=2019&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A126417351%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F31011775&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1007%2Fs00253-019-09813-z&amp;rft.aulast=Singh&amp;rft.aufirst=NK&amp;rft.au=Wood%2C+JM&amp;rft.au=Mhatre%2C+SS&amp;rft.au=Venkateswaran%2C+K&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-350"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-350" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFDietrichVega1995" class="citation journal cs1">Dietrich, C. <li id="cite_note-Kudoa2017-352"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Kudoa2017_352-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Kudoa2017_352-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFKasaiSetsudaSato2017" class="citation journal cs1">Kasai, A.; Setsuda, A.; Sato, H. <li id="cite_note-Allegro2007-358"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Allegro2007_358-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Allegro2007_358-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFAllegro2007" class="citation journal cs1">Allegro, G. <li id="cite_note-359"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-359" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFJohnsonYoungSteelFoffa2017" class="citation journal cs1">Johnson, M. Soc</i>. <b>182</b> (2): <span class="nowrap">385–</span>418. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1093%2Fzoolinnean%2Fzlx035">10.1093/zoolinnean/zlx035</a></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Zool.+J.+Linn.+Soc.&amp;rft.atitle=Re-description+of+Steneosaurus+obtusidens+Andrews%2C+1909%2C+an+unusual+macrophagous+teleosaurid+crocodylomorph+from+the+Middle+Jurassic+of+England&amp;rft.volume=182&amp;rft.issue=2&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E385-%3C%2Fspan%3E418&amp;rft.date=2017&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1093%2Fzoolinnean%2Fzlx035&amp;rft.aulast=Johnson&amp;rft.aufirst=M.+M.&amp;rft.au=Young%2C+M.+T.&amp;rft.au=Steel%2C+L.&amp;rft.au=Foffa%2C+D.&amp;rft.au=Smith%2C+A.+S.&amp;rft.au=Hua%2C+S.&amp;rft.au=Havlik%2C+P.&amp;rft.au=Howlett%2C+E.+A.&amp;rft.au=Dyke%2C+G.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.1093%252Fzoolinnean%252Fzlx035&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-369"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-369" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFGraf2007" class="citation journal cs1">Graf, W. (2007). "<i>Leuctra dylani</i> sp. n. (Plecoptera: Leuctridae) from Italy". <i>Aquatic Insects</i>. <b>29</b> (1): <span class="nowrap">17–</span>20. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bibcode_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Bibcode (identifier)">Bibcode</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2007AqIns..29...17G">2007AqIns..29...17G</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1080%2F01650420701216229">10.1080/01650420701216229</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:84438224">84438224</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Aquatic+Insects&amp;rft.atitle=Leuctra+dylani+sp.+n.+%28Plecoptera%3A+Leuctridae%29+from+Italy&amp;rft.volume=29&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E17-%3C%2Fspan%3E20&amp;rft.date=2007&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A84438224%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1080%2F01650420701216229&amp;rft_id=info%3Abibcode%2F2007AqIns..29...17G&amp;rft.aulast=Graf&amp;rft.aufirst=W.&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-CiudadanoPetrulevicius-371"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-CiudadanoPetrulevicius_371-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFAranda2021" class="citation web cs1 cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source">Aranda, Agustín (15 February 2021). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.elciudadanoweb.com/de-barrilete-a-libelula-bautizo-un-fosil-de-insecto-desconocido-en-homenaje-a-maradona">"De barrilete a libélula: bautizó un fósil de insecto desconocido en homenaje a Maradona"</a>. <i>El Ciudadano</i> (in Spanish).</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.jtitle=El+Ciudadano&amp;rft.atitle=De+barrilete+a+lib%C3%A9lula%3A+bautiz%C3%B3+un+f%C3%B3sil+de+insecto+desconocido+en+homenaje+a+Maradona&amp;rft.date=2021-02-15&amp;rft.aulast=Aranda&amp;rft.aufirst=Agust%C3%ADn&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.elciudadanoweb.com%2Fde-barrilete-a-libelula-bautizo-un-fosil-de-insecto-desconocido-en-homenaje-a-maradona&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-377"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-377" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFMandell2012" class="citation news cs1">Mandell, N. <li id="cite_note-378"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-378" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFZamaniMirshamsiMarusik2021" class="citation journal cs1">Zamani A, Mirshamsi O, Marusik YM (March 2021). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1093%2Fjme%2Ftjaa257">"<span class="cs1-kern-left"></span>'Burning Violin': The Medically Important Spider Genus <i>Loxosceles</i> (Araneae: Sicariidae) in Iran, Turkmenistan, and Afghanistan, With Two New Species"</a>. <i>Journal of Medical Entomology</i>. <b>58</b> (2): <span class="nowrap">666–</span>675. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1093%2Fjme%2Ftjaa257">10.1093/jme/tjaa257</a></span>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33300575">33300575</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Journal+of+Medical+Entomology&amp;rft.atitle=%27Burning+Violin%27%3A+The+Medically+Important+Spider+Genus+Loxosceles+%28Araneae%3A+Sicariidae%29+in+Iran%2C+Turkmenistan%2C+and+Afghanistan%2C+With+Two+New+Species&amp;rft.volume=58&amp;rft.issue=2&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E666-%3C%2Fspan%3E675&amp;rft.date=2021-03&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1093%2Fjme%2Ftjaa257&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F33300575&amp;rft.aulast=Zamani&amp;rft.aufirst=A&amp;rft.au=Mirshamsi%2C+O&amp;rft.au=Marusik%2C+YM&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.1093%252Fjme%252Ftjaa257&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" </li>

<li id="cite_note-387"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-387" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFSampsonCarranoForster2001" class="citation journal cs1">Sampson, S.D.; Carrano, M.T.; Forster, C.A. <li id="cite_note-395"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-395" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFDantasWecksteinBatesOliveira2021" class="citation journal cs1">Dantas, S.M.; Weckstein, J.D.; Bates, J.; Oliveira, J.N.; Catanach, T.A.; Aleixo, A. <li id="cite_note-PeraPere14-397"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-PeraPere14_397-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFPerafánPérez-Miles2014" class="citation journal cs1">Perafán, C. &amp; Pérez-Miles, F. (2014). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4023263">"Three new species of <i>Melloleitaoina</i> Gerschman and Schiapelli, 1960 (Araneae, Mygalomorphae, Theraphosidae) from northern Argentina"</a>. <i>ZooKeys</i> (404): <span class="nowrap">17–</span>129. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bibcode_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Bibcode (identifier)">Bibcode</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2014ZooK..404..117P">2014ZooK..404..117P</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.3897%2Fzookeys.404.6243">10.3897/zookeys.404.6243</a></span>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMC_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMC (identifier)">PMC</a>&nbsp;<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4023263">4023263</a></span>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24843274">24843274</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=ZooKeys&amp;rft.atitle=Three+new+species+of+Melloleitaoina+Gerschman+and+Schiapelli%2C+1960+%28Araneae%2C+Mygalomorphae%2C+Theraphosidae%29+from+northern+Argentina&amp;rft.issue=404&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E17-%3C%2Fspan%3E129&amp;rft.date=2014&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC4023263%23id-name%3DPMC&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F24843274&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.3897%2Fzookeys.404.6243&amp;rft_id=info%3Abibcode%2F2014ZooK..404..117P&amp;rft.aulast=Peraf%C3%A1n&amp;rft.aufirst=C.&amp;rft.au=P%C3%A9rez-Miles%2C+F.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC4023263&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" </li>
<li id="cite_note-Tmesi2019-398"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Tmesi2019_398-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Tmesi2019_398-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFFabiano-Da-SilvaGuadanucciDasilvaMB2019" class="citation journal cs1">Fabiano-Da-Silva W, Guadanucci JP, Dasilva, MB (2019). "Taxonomy and phylogenetics of <i>Tmesiphantes</i> Simon, 1892 (Araneae, Theraphosidae)". <i>Systematics and Biodiversity</i>. <b>17</b> (7): <span class="nowrap">650–</span>668. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bibcode_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Bibcode (identifier)">Bibcode</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2019SyBio..17..650F">2019SyBio..17..650F</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1080%2F14772000.2019.1685021">10.1080/14772000.2019.1685021</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:213786373">213786373</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Systematics+and+Biodiversity&amp;rft.atitle=Taxonomy+and+phylogenetics+of+Tmesiphantes+Simon%2C+1892+%28Araneae%2C+Theraphosidae%29&amp;rft.volume=17&amp;rft.issue=7&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E650-%3C%2Fspan%3E668&amp;rft.date=2019&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A213786373%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1080%2F14772000.2019.1685021&amp;rft_id=info%3Abibcode%2F2019SyBio..17..650F&amp;rft.aulast=Fabiano-Da-Silva&amp;rft.aufirst=W&amp;rft.au=Guadanucci%2C+JP&amp;rft.au=Dasilva&amp;rft.au=MB&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-405"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-405" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFFonsecaHooferPorterCline2007" class="citation book cs1">Fonseca, R. </li>
<li id="cite_note-Lieberman1994-406"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Lieberman1994_406-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFLieberman1994" class="citation journal cs1">Lieberman,
 B. S. (1994). "Evolution of the trilobite subfamily Proetinae Salter, 
1864, and the origin, diversification, evolutionary affinity, and 
extinction of the Middle Devonian proetid fauna of eastern North 
America". <i>Bull. Am. Mus. Nat. Hist</i>. <b>223</b>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hdl_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Hdl (identifier)">hdl</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://hdl.handle.net/2246%2F831">2246/831</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Bull.+Am.+Mus.+Nat.+Hist.&amp;rft.atitle=Evolution+of+the+trilobite+subfamily+Proetinae+Salter%2C+1864%2C+and+the+origin%2C+diversification%2C+evolutionary+affinity%2C+and+extinction+of+the+Middle+Devonian+proetid+fauna+of+eastern+North+America&amp;rft.volume=223&amp;rft.date=1994&amp;rft_id=info%3Ahdl%2F2246%2F831&amp;rft.aulast=Lieberman&amp;rft.aufirst=B.+S.&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-407"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-407" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFSchmid-EggerAl-Jahdhami2022" class="citation journal cs1">Schmid-Egger, C.; Al-Jahdhami, A. (2022). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://epub.jku.at/download/pdf/8293562.pdf">"The
 genus Miscophus JURINE, 1807 in Arabian Peninsula and southern Israel 
with description of seven new species (Hymenoptera, Spheciformes)"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <i>Linzer biologische Beiträge</i>. <b>54</b> (1): <span class="nowrap">319–</span>340.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Linzer+biologische+Beitr%C3%A4ge&amp;rft.atitle=The+genus+Miscophus+JURINE%2C+1807+in+Arabian+Peninsula+and+southern+Israel+with+description+of+seven+new+species+%28Hymenoptera%2C+Spheciformes%29&amp;rft.volume=54&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E319-%3C%2Fspan%3E340&amp;rft.date=2022&amp;rft.aulast=Schmid-Egger&amp;rft.aufirst=C.&amp;rft.au=Al-Jahdhami%2C+A.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fepub.jku.at%2Fdownload%2Fpdf%2F8293562.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-Mizotrechus2011-410"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Mizotrechus2011_410-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Mizotrechus2011_410-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFErwin2011" class="citation journal cs1"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terry_Erwin" title="Terry Erwin">Erwin, T.</a> (2011). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3267457">"Rainforest understory beetles of the Neotropics: <i>Mizotrechus</i>

Perigonini)"</a>. <i>ZooKeys</i> (145): <span class="nowrap">79–</span>128. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.3897%2Fzookeys.145.2274">10.3897/zookeys.145.2274</a></span>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMC_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMC (identifier)">PMC</a>&nbsp;<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3267457">3267457</a></span>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22287885">22287885</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=ZooKeys&amp;rft.atitle=Rainforest+understory+beetles+of+the+Neotropics%3A+Mizotrechus+Bates+1872%2C+a+generic+synopsis+with+descriptions+of+new+species+from+Central+America+and+northern+South+America+%28Coleoptera%2C+Carabidae%2C+Perigonini%29&amp;rft.issue=145&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E79-%3C%2Fspan%3E128&amp;rft.date=2011&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC3267457%23id-name%3DPMC&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F22287885&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.3897%2Fzookeys.145.2274&amp;rft.aulast=Erwin&amp;rft.aufirst=T.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC3267457&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-412"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-412" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFSharafFisherCollingwoodAldawood2017" class="citation journal cs1">Sharaf MR, Fisher BL, Collingwood CA, Aldawood AS (2017). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.researchgate.net/publication/313059560">"Ant

<li id="cite_note-JDS-414"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-JDS_414-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFScanlon2001" class="citation book cs1">Scanlon, J.D. <li id="cite_note-415"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-415" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFMacphersonAmonClark2014" class="citation journal cs1">Macpherson E, Amon D, Clark PF (January 2014). "A new species of <i>Munidopsis</i> from a seamount of the Southwest Indian Ocean Ridge (Decapoda: Munidopsidae)". <i>Zootaxa</i>. <b>3753</b> (3): <span class="nowrap">291–</span>6. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.11646%2Fzootaxa.3753.3.8">10.11646/zootaxa.3753.3.8</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24872299">24872299</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:6165785">6165785</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Zootaxa&amp;rft.atitle=A+new+species+of+Munidopsis+from+a+seamount+of+the+Southwest+Indian+Ocean+Ridge+%28Decapoda%3A+Munidopsidae%29&amp;rft.volume=3753&amp;rft.issue=3&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E291-%3C%2Fspan%3E6&amp;rft.date=2014-01&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A6165785%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F24872299&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.11646%2Fzootaxa.3753.3.8&amp;rft.aulast=Macpherson&amp;rft.aufirst=E&amp;rft.au=Amon%2C+D&amp;rft.au=Clark%2C+PF&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-416"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-416" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFSherwoodGabriel2022" class="citation journal cs1">Sherwood, D.; Gabriel, R. </li>
<li id="cite_note-425"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-425" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFRíos-RuizRivera-NuñezAlcaraz-ArizaObón-de-Castro1999" class="citation journal cs1">Ríos-Ruiz, S.; Rivera-Nuñez, D.; Alcaraz-Ariza, F.; Obón-de-Castro, C. (1999). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1111%2Fj.1095-8339.1999.tb01846.x">"Three new species of <i>Narcissus</i> L. subgenus <i>Ajax</i> Spach (Amaryllidaceae), restricted to the meadows and forests of south-eastern Spain"</a>. <i>Botanical Journal of the Linnean Society</i>. <b>131</b> (2): <span class="nowrap">153–</span>165. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1111%2Fj.1095-8339.1999.tb01846.x">10.1111/j.1095-8339.1999.tb01846.x</a></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Botanical+Journal+of+the+Linnean+Society&amp;rft.atitle=Three+new+species+of+Narcissus+L.+subgenus+Ajax+Spach+%28Amaryllidaceae%29%2C+restricted+to+the+meadows+and+forests+of+south-eastern+Spain&amp;rft.volume=131&amp;rft.issue=2&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E153-%3C%2Fspan%3E165&amp;rft.date=1999&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1111%2Fj.1095-8339.1999.tb01846.x&amp;rft.aulast=R%C3%ADos-Ruiz&amp;rft.aufirst=S.&amp;rft.au=Rivera-Nu%C3%B1ez%2C+D.&amp;rft.au=Alcaraz-Ariza%2C+F.&amp;rft.au=Ob%C3%B3n-de-Castro%2C+C.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.1111%252Fj.1095-8339.1999.tb01846.x&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-Brazil1958-433"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Brazil1958_433-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Brazil1958_433-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Brazil1958_433-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Brazil1958_433-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Brazil1958_433-4"><sup><i><b>e</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Brazil1958_433-5"><sup><i><b>f</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Brazil1958_433-6"><sup><i><b>g</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Brazil1958_433-7"><sup><i><b>h</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Brazil1958_433-8"><sup><i><b>i</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Brazil1958_433-9"><sup><i><b>j</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Brazil1958_433-10"><sup><i><b>k</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Brazil1958_433-11"><sup><i><b>l</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFSantosNessimian2009" class="citation journal cs1">Santos, A.P.M.; Nessimian, J.L. (2009). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.researchgate.net/publication/250054570">"New species and records of <i>Neotrichia</i> (Trichoptera: Hydroptilidae) from Central Amazonia, Brazil"</a>. <i>Zoologia</i>. <b>26</b> (4): <span class="nowrap">758–</span>768. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1590%2FS1984-46702009000400022">10.1590/S1984-46702009000400022</a></span><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-442"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-442" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFClausnitzerDijkstra2005" class="citation journal cs1">Clausnitzer, Viola; Dijkstra, Klaas-Douwe B. <li id="cite_note-443"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-443" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFSánchez-FenollosaVerdúCobos2023" class="citation journal cs1">Sánchez-
Fenollosa, S.; Verdú, F.; Cobos, A. (2023). "The largest ornithopod 
(Dinosauria: Ornithischia) from the Upper Jurassic of Europe sheds light
 on the evolutionary history of basal ankylopollexians". <i>Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society</i>. <b>199</b> (4): <span class="nowrap">1013–</span>1033. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1093%2Fzoolinnean%2Fzlad076">10.1093/zoolinnean/zlad076</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Zoological+Journal+of+the+Linnean+Society&amp;rft.atitle=The+largest+ornithopod+%28Dinosauria%3A+Ornithischia%29+from+the+Upper+Jurassic+of+Europe+sheds+light+on+the+evolutionary+history+of+basal+ankylopollexians&amp;rft.volume=199&amp;rft.issue=4&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E1013-%3C%2Fspan%3E1033&amp;rft.date=2023&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1093%2Fzoolinnean%2Fzlad076&amp;rft.aulast=S%C3%A1nchez-Fenollosa&amp;rft.aufirst=S.&amp;rft.au=Verd%C3%BA%2C+F.&amp;rft.au=Cobos%2C+A.&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
