(2009). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.11646%2Fzootaxa.2162.1.1">"A revision of the neotropical genus <i>Ocyolinus</i> (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini)"</a>. <i>Zootaxa</i>. <b>2162</b> (1): <span class="nowrap">1–</span>23. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.11646%2Fzootaxa.2162.1.1">10.11646/zootaxa.2162.1.1</a></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Zootaxa&amp;rft.atitle=A+revision+of+the+neotropical+genus+Ocyolinus+%28Coleoptera%3A+Staphylinidae%3A+Staphylinini%29&amp;rft.volume=2162&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E1-%3C%2Fspan%3E23&amp;rft.date=2009&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.11646%2Fzootaxa.2162.1.1&amp;rft.aulast=Chatzimanolis&amp;rft.aufirst=S.&amp;rft.au=Ashe%2C+J.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.11646%252Fzootaxa.2162.1.1&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

</li>
<li id="cite_note-ThuyErik2022-454"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-ThuyErik2022_454-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-ThuyErik2022_454-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFThuyErikssonKutscherLindgren2022" class="citation journal cs1">Thuy, B.; Eriksson, M.E.; Kutscher, M.; Lindgren, J.; Numberger-Thuy, L.D.; Wright, D.F. (2022). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8748437">"Miniaturization during a Silurian environmental crisis generated the modern brittle star body plan"</a>. <i>Communications Biology</i>. <b>5</b> (1): 14. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1038%2Fs42003-021-02971-9">10.1038/s42003-021-02971-9</a></span>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMC_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMC (identifier)">PMC</a>&nbsp;<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8748437">8748437</a></span>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/35013524">35013524</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Communications+Biology&amp;rft.atitle=Miniaturization+during+a+Silurian+environmental+crisis+generated+the+modern+brittle+star+body+plan&amp;rft.volume=5&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.pages=14&amp;rft.date=2022&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC8748437%23id-name%3DPMC&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F35013524&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1038%2Fs42003-021-02971-9&amp;rft.aulast=Thuy&amp;rft.aufirst=B.&amp;rft.au=Eriksson%2C+M.E.&amp;rft.au=Kutscher%2C+M.&amp;rft.au=Lindgren%2C+J.&amp;rft.au=Numberger-Thuy%2C+L.D.&amp;rft.au=Wright%2C+D.F.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC8748437&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-462"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-462" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFBauzáGelfoLópez2019" class="citation journal cs1">Bauzá, N.; Gelfo, J. N.; López, G. M. (2019). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.4202%2Fapp.00565.2018">"Early

America: A new henricosborniid from the Eocene of Patagonia"</a>. <i>Acta Palaeontologica Polonica</i>. <b>64</b> (3): <span class="nowrap">597–</span>603. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.4202%2Fapp.00565.2018">10.4202/app.00565.2018</a></span>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hdl_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Hdl (identifier)">hdl</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://hdl.handle.net/11336%2F127842">11336/127842</a></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Acta+Palaeontologica+Polonica&amp;rft.atitle=Early+steps+in+the+radiation+of+notoungulate+mammals+in+southern+South+America%3A+A+new+henricosborniid+from+the+Eocene+of+Patagonia&amp;rft.volume=64&amp;rft.issue=3&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E597-%3C%2Fspan%3E603&amp;rft.date=2019&amp;rft_id=info%3Ahdl%2F11336%2F127842&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.4202%2Fapp.00565.2018&amp;rft.aulast=Bauz%C3%A1&amp;rft.aufirst=N.&amp;rft.au=Gelfo%2C+J.+N.&amp;rft.au=L%C3%B3pez%2C+G.+M.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.4202%252Fapp.00565.2018&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-Hormiga2002-463"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Hormiga2002_463-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFHormiga2002" class="citation journal cs1">Hormiga, Gustavo (2002). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.gwu.edu/~spiders/content/publications/Hormiga%202002.pdf">"<i>Orsonwelles</i>, a new genus of giant linyphiid spiders (Araneae) from the Hawaiian Islands"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <i>Invertebrate Systematics</i>. <b>16</b> (3): <span class="nowrap">369–</span>448. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1071%2FIT01026">10.1071/IT01026</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Invertebrate+Systematics&amp;rft.atitle=Orsonwelles%2C+a+new+genus+of+giant+linyphiid+spiders+%28Araneae%29+from+the+Hawaiian+Islands&amp;rft.volume=16&amp;rft.issue=3&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E369-%3C%2Fspan%3E448&amp;rft.date=2002&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1071%2FIT01026&amp;rft.aulast=Hormiga&amp;rft.aufirst=Gustavo&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.gwu.edu%2F~spiders%2Fcontent%2Fpublications%2FHormiga%25202002.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

</li>
<li id="cite_note-473"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-473" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFDazaCaicedoLisiQuiroga2017" class="citation journal cs1">Daza A, Caicedo M, Lisi O, Quiroga S (2017). <li id="cite_note-Stooges-482"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Stooges_482-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Stooges_482-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFWeirauchFrankenberg2015" class="citation journal cs1">Weirauch, C.; Frankenberg, S. (2015). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.senckenberg.de/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/05_asp_73_3_weirauch_457-475.pdf">"From "insect soup" to biodiversity discovery: taxonomic revision of <i>Peloridinannus</i> Wygodzinsky,1951 (Hemiptera: Schizopteridae), with description of six new species"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <i>Arthropod Systematics &amp; Phylogeny</i>. <b>73</b> (3): <span class="nowrap">457–</span>475. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.3897%2Fasp.73.e31832">10.3897/asp.73.e31832</a></span><span class="reference-accessdate">. </li>

(2014). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.researchgate.net/publication/262042203">"The Andean tarantulas <i>Euathlus</i> Ausserer, 1875, <i>Paraphysa</i> Simon, 1892 and <i>Phrixotrichus</i> Simon, 1889 (Araneae: Theraphosidae): phylogenetic analysis, genera redefinition and new species descriptions"</a>. <i>Journal of Natural History</i>. <b>48</b> (<span class="nowrap">39–</span>40): <span class="nowrap">2389–</span>2418. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1080%2F00222933.2014.902142">10.1080/00222933.2014.902142</a> – via ResearchGate.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Journal+of+Natural+History&amp;rft.atitle=The+Andean+tarantulas+Euathlus+Ausserer%2C+1875%2C+Paraphysa+Simon%2C+1892+and+Phrixotrichus+Simon%2C+1889+%28Araneae%3A+Theraphosidae%29%3A+phylogenetic+analysis%2C+genera+redefinition+and+new+species+descriptions&amp;rft.volume=48&amp;rft.issue=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E39%E2%80%93%3C%2Fspan%3E40&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E2389-%3C%2Fspan%3E2418&amp;rft.date=2014&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1080%2F00222933.2014.902142&amp;rft.aulast=Peraf%C3%A1n&amp;rft.aufirst=C.&amp;rft.au=P%C3%A9rez-Miles%2C+F.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.researchgate.net%2Fpublication%2F262042203&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-491"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-491" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFVörösRibeiro_DiasSolé2017" class="citation journal cs1">Vörös, J.; Ribeiro Dias, I.; Solé, M. (2017). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.researchgate.net/publication/320535130">"A new species of <i>Phyllodytes</i> (Anura: Hylidae) from the Atlantic Rainforest of southern Bahia, Brazil"</a>. <i>Zootaxa</i>. <b>4337</b> (4): <span class="nowrap">584–</span>594. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.11646%2Fzootaxa.4337.4.9">10.11646/zootaxa.4337.4.9</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29245759">29245759</a><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-Rheindt2020-492"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Rheindt2020_492-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Rheindt2020_492-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFRheindtPrawiradilagaAshariSuparno2020" class="citation journal cs1">Rheindt, F. <li id="cite_note-Pleisticanthoides-500"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Pleisticanthoides_500-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFNgRicher_de_Forges2012" class="citation journal cs1">Ng, Peter K.L.; Richer de Forges, Bertrand (2012). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.researchgate.net/publication/258033163">"<i>Pleisticanthoides</i>

 species from the Philippines, Papua New Guinea and Vanuatu"</a>. <i>Zootaxa</i>. <b>3551</b> (1): <span class="nowrap">65–</span>81. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.11646%2Fzootaxa.3551.1.5">10.11646/zootaxa.3551.1.5</a><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">20 April</span> 2021</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Zootaxa&amp;rft.atitle=Pleisticanthoides+Yokoya%2C+1933%2C+a+valid+genus+of+deep-sea+inachid+spider+crabs+%28Crustacea%3A+Decapoda%3A+Brachyura%3A+Majoidea%29%2C+with+descriptions+of+two+new+species+from+the+Philippines%2C+Papua+New+Guinea+and+Vanuatu&amp;rft.volume=3551&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E65-%3C%2Fspan%3E81&amp;rft.date=2012&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.11646%2Fzootaxa.3551.1.5&amp;rft.aulast=Ng&amp;rft.aufirst=Peter+K.L.&amp;rft.au=Richer+de+Forges%2C+Bertrand&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.researchgate.net%2Fpublication%2F258033163&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-501"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-501" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFThompson2020" class="citation book cs1">Thompson, W. <li id="cite_note-510"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-510" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFPereiraLabarque2021" class="citation journal cs1">Pereira, M. <li id="cite_note-511"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-511" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFBuffington2004" class="citation journal cs1">Buffington, M. L. (2004). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.researchgate.net/publication/274712663">"The description of <i>Preseucoela</i> Buffington, new genus, with notes on the status of Nearctic species of <i>Agrostocynips</i> Diaz (Hymenoptera: Figitidae: Eucoilinae)"</a>. <i>Zootaxa</i>. <b>408</b>: <span class="nowrap">1–</span>11. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.11646%2Fzootaxa.408.1.1">10.11646/zootaxa.408.1.1</a><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-Protopliomerella-519"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Protopliomerella_519-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Protopliomerella_519-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Protopliomerella_519-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Protopliomerella_519-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFMcAdamsAdrain2011" class="citation journal cs1">McAdams, Neo E.B.; Adrain, Jonathan M. (2011). <li id="cite_note-520"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-520" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFOrteaEspinosa2018" class="citation journal cs1 cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source">Ortea, J.; Espinosa, J. (2018). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20211201091910/https://www.avicennia.es/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/Donde-habita-Prunum-gijon.pdf">"Donde habita <i>Prunum gijon</i> Espinosa &amp; Ortea, 2005 (Gastropoda: Marginellidae) tenía que existir <i>Prunum quini</i>, especie nueva, nombrada en honor de Enrique Castro, un futbolista ejemplar y un ejemplar ser humano"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <i>Avicennia</i> (in Spanish). <b>22</b>: <span class="nowrap">61–</span>66. Archived from <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.avicennia.es/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/Donde-habita-Prunum-gijon.pdf">the original</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span> on 1 December 2021<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">1 December</span> 2021</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Avicennia&amp;rft.atitle=Donde+habita+Prunum+gijon+Espinosa+%26+Ortea%2C+2005+%28Gastropoda%3A+Marginellidae%29+ten%C3%ADa+que+existir+Prunum+quini%2C+especie+nueva%2C+nombrada+en+honor+de+Enrique+Castro%2C+un+futbolista+ejemplar+y+un+ejemplar+ser+humano&amp;rft.volume=22&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E61-%3C%2Fspan%3E66&amp;rft.date=2018&amp;rft.aulast=Ortea&amp;rft.aufirst=J.&amp;rft.au=Espinosa%2C+J.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.avicennia.es%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2018%2F09%2FDonde-habita-Prunum-gijon.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-Psalikilopsis-521"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Psalikilopsis_521-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Psalikilopsis_521-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFAdrainMcAdamsWestropKarim2011" class="citation journal cs1">Adrain, Jonathan M.; McAdams, Neo E.B.; Westrop, Stephen R.; Karim, Talia S. <li id="cite_note-Pseudharpinia2020-524"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Pseudharpinia2020_524-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Pseudharpinia2020_524-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Pseudharpinia2020_524-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Pseudharpinia2020_524-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFAndradeSenna2020" class="citation journal cs1">Andrade LF, Senna AR (2020). <li id="cite_note-528"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-528" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFSchilthuizenvan_OostenbruggeVisservan_der_Meer2021" class="citation journal cs1">Schilthuizen
 M, van Oostenbrugge W, Visser S, van der Meer M, Delval R, Dias C, 
Köster H, Maarschall R, Peeters N, Venema P, Zaremba R, Beltrami C,

Koene JM (2021). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1163%2F18759866-BJA10007">"<i>Ptomaphagus thebeatles</i>

urban taxonomy and recent range expansion (Coleoptera: Leiodidae)"</a>. <i>Contributions to Zoology</i>. <b>90</b> (1): <span class="nowrap">1–</span>20. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1163%2F18759866-BJA10007">10.1163/18759866-BJA10007</a></span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Contributions+to+Zoology&amp;rft.atitle=Ptomaphagus+thebeatles+n.+sp.%2C+a+previously+unrecognized+beetle+from+Europe%2C+with+remarks+on+urban+taxonomy+and+recent+range+expansion+%28Coleoptera%3A+Leiodidae%29&amp;rft.volume=90&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E1-%3C%2Fspan%3E20&amp;rft.date=2021&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1163%2F18759866-BJA10007&amp;rft.aulast=Schilthuizen&amp;rft.aufirst=M&amp;rft.au=van+Oostenbrugge%2C+W&amp;rft.au=Visser%2C+S&amp;rft.au=van+der+Meer%2C+M&amp;rft.au=Delval%2C+R&amp;rft.au=Dias%2C+C&amp;rft.au=K%C3%B6ster%2C+H&amp;rft.au=Maarschall%2C+R&amp;rft.au=Peeters%2C+N&amp;rft.au=Venema%2C+P&amp;rft.au=Zaremba%2C+R&amp;rft.au=Beltrami%2C+C&amp;rft.au=Rossato%2C+M&amp;rft.au=Latella%2C+L&amp;rft.au=Nieuwenhuis%2C+F&amp;rft.au=de+Rop%2C+N&amp;rft.au=Njunji%C4%87%2C+I&amp;rft.au=Perreau%2C+M&amp;rft.au=Koene%2C+JM&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.1163%252F18759866-BJA10007&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-538"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-538" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFOrteaEspinosaMagaña2004" class="citation journal cs1 cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source">Ortea, J.; Espinosa, J.; Magaña, J. <li id="cite_note-556"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-556" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFDaniel2012" class="citation web cs1">Daniel, Smriti (10 June 2012). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.sundaytimes.lk/120610/Plus/plus_05.html">"Solving the puzzle that is 'Serendipaceratops arthurcclarkei'<span class="cs1-kern-right"></span>"</a>. <i>sundaytimes.lk</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-Socca22-565"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Socca22_565-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Socca22_565-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Socca22_565-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFFramenauCastanheiraVink2022" class="citation journal cs1">Framenau,

<li id="cite_note-566"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-566" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFCuezzoFernández2001" class="citation journal cs1">Cuezzo, M.G.; Fernández, I. <li id="cite_note-567"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-567" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFChecinska_SielaffKumarPalMayilraj2017" class="citation journal cs1">Checinska Sielaff A, Kumar RM, Pal D, Mayilraj S, Venkateswaran K (2017). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1099%2Fijsem.0.001706">"<i>Solibacillus kalamii</i> sp. nov., isolated from a high-efficiency particulate arrestance filter system used in the International Space Station"</a>. <i>Int. J. Syst. Evol. </li>
<li id="cite_note-577"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-577" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFHendrixson,_Brent_E.Bond,_Jason_E.2004" class="citation journal cs1">Hendrixson, Brent E.; Bond, Jason E. <li id="cite_note-silurian1993-586"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-silurian1993_586-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-silurian1993_586-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-silurian1993_586-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-silurian1993_586-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFEdgecombeChatterton1993" class="citation journal cs1">Edgecombe, Gregory D.; Chatterton, Brian D.E. <li id="cite_note-Buhl1997-596"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Buhl1997_596-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFBuhl1997" class="citation journal cs1">Buhl, P.N. <li id="cite_note-606"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-606" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFSharafAldawoodEconomoWachkoo2019" class="citation journal cs1">Sharaf MR, Aldawood AS, Economo EP, Wachkoo <li id="cite_note-Teresirogas-607"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Teresirogas_607-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Teresirogas_607-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFQuickeShawvan_AchterbergBland2014" class="citation journal cs1">Quicke D, Shaw MR, van Achterberg C, Bland KP, Butcher BA, Lyszkowski R, Zhang YM (2014). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.researchgate.net/publication/270221711">"A
 new Australian genus and five new species of Rogadinae (Hymenoptera: 
Braconidae), one reared as a gregarious endoparasitoid of an 
unidentified limacodid (Lepidoptera)"</a>. <i>Zootaxa</i>. <b>3881</b> (3): <span class="nowrap">237–</span>257. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.11646%2Fzootaxa.3881.3.3">10.11646/zootaxa.3881.3.3</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25543633">25543633</a> – via ResearchGate.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Zootaxa&amp;rft.atitle=A+new+Australian+genus+and+five+new+species+of+Rogadinae+%28Hymenoptera%3A+Braconidae%29%2C+one+reared+as+a+gregarious+endoparasitoid+of+an+unidentified+limacodid+%28Lepidoptera%29&amp;rft.volume=3881&amp;rft.issue=3&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E237-%3C%2Fspan%3E257&amp;rft.date=2014&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.11646%2Fzootaxa.3881.3.3&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F25543633&amp;rft.aulast=Quicke&amp;rft.aufirst=D&amp;rft.au=Shaw%2C+MR&amp;rft.au=van+Achterberg%2C+C&amp;rft.au=Bland%2C+KP&amp;rft.au=Butcher%2C+BA&amp;rft.au=Lyszkowski%2C+R&amp;rft.au=Zhang%2C+YM&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.researchgate.net%2Fpublication%2F270221711&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-Tmesi2007-613"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Tmesi2007_613-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a <li id="cite_note-614"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-614" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFÁlvarez-PadillaUbickGriswold2012" class="citation journal cs1">Álvarez-Padilla, F.; Ubick, D.; Griswold, C. </li>
<li id="cite_note-615"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-615" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFCavinGiner2012" class="citation journal cs1">Cavin,
 L.; Giner, S. (2012). "A large halecomorph fish (Actinopterygii: 
Holostei) from the Valanginian (Early Cretaceous) of southeast France". <i>Cretaceous Research</i>. <b>37</b>: <span class="nowrap">201–</span>208. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1016%2Fj.cretres.2012.03.020">10.1016/j.cretres.2012.03.020</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISSN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISSN (identifier)">ISSN</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://search.worldcat.org/issn/0195-6671">0195-6671</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Cretaceous+Research&amp;rft.atitle=A+large+halecomorph+fish+%28Actinopterygii%3A+Holostei%29+from+the+Valanginian+%28Early+Cretaceous%29+of+southeast+France&amp;rft.volume=37&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E201-%3C%2Fspan%3E208&amp;rft.date=2012&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1016%2Fj.cretres.2012.03.020&amp;rft.issn=0195-6671&amp;rft.aulast=Cavin&amp;rft.aufirst=L.&amp;rft.au=Giner%2C+S.&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-616"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-616" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFElíasBremecda_Cunha_LanaOrensanz2003" class="citation journal cs1">Elías
 R, Bremec CS, da Cunha Lana P, Orensanz JM (2003). "Opheliidae 
(Polychaeta) from the Southwestern Atlantic ocean, with the description 
of <i>Travisia amadoi</i> n. sp., <i>Ophelina gaucha</i> n. sp. and <i>Ophelina alata</i> n. sp". <i>Hydrobiologia</i>. <b>496</b> (<span class="nowrap">1–</span>3): <span class="nowrap">75–</span>85. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1023%2FA%3A1026172126482">10.1023/A:1026172126482</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hdl_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Hdl (identifier)">hdl</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://hdl.handle.net/11336%2F97800">11336/97800</a></span>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:33862455">33862455</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Hydrobiologia&amp;rft.atitle=Opheliidae+%28Polychaeta%29+from+the+Southwestern+Atlantic+ocean%2C+with+the+description+of+Travisia+amadoi+n.+sp.%2C+Ophelina+gaucha+n.+sp.+and+Ophelina+alata+n.+sp.&amp;rft.volume=496&amp;rft.issue=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E1%E2%80%93%3C%2Fspan%3E3&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E75-%3C%2Fspan%3E85&amp;rft.date=2003&amp;rft_id=info%3Ahdl%2F11336%2F97800&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A33862455%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1023%2FA%3A1026172126482&amp;rft.aulast=El%C3%ADas&amp;rft.aufirst=R&amp;rft.au=Bremec%2C+CS&amp;rft.au=da+Cunha+Lana%2C+P&amp;rft.au=Orensanz%2C+JM&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-RiosTamayo2024-621"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-RiosTamayo2024_621-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-RiosTamayo2024_621-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFRíos-Tamayo2024" class="citation journal cs1">Ríos-Tamayo, D. <li id="cite_note-Triplocania21-624"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Triplocania21_624-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Triplocania21_624-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFGonzález-ObandoCarrejo-GironzaGarcía_Aldrete2021" class="citation journal cs1">González-Obando, R.; Carrejo-Gironza, N.; García Aldrete, A.N. "New species of <i>Triplocania</i> Roesler (Psocodea: 'Psocoptera': Ptiloneuridae) from Colombia and Peru". <i>Zootaxa</i>. <b>5080</b> (1): 163. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.11646%2Fzootaxa.5080.1.1">10.11646/zootaxa.5080.1.1</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/35390829">35390829</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:245046897">245046897</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Zootaxa&amp;rft.atitle=New+species+of+Triplocania+Roesler+%28Psocodea%3A+%27Psocoptera%27%3A+Ptiloneuridae%29+from+Colombia+and+Peru&amp;rft.volume=5080&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.pages=163&amp;rft.date=2021&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A245046897%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F35390829&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.11646%2Fzootaxa.5080.1.1&amp;rft.aulast=Gonz%C3%A1lez-Obando&amp;rft.aufirst=R.&amp;rft.au=Carrejo-Gironza%2C+N.&amp;rft.au=Garc%C3%ADa+Aldrete%2C+A.N.&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-Ummidia21-633"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Ummidia21_633-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link <li id="cite_note-634"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-634" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFLogunovObenauer2019" class="citation journal cs1">Logunov, D.V.; Obenauer, S.M. (2019). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20220307082849/http://www.entomology.org.il/sites/default/files/pdfs/1_Logunov_Obenauer_2019_IJE_UroballusHongKong.pdf">"A new species of <i>Uroballus</i> Simon, 1902 (Araneae: Salticidae) from Hong Kong, a jumping spider that appears to mimic lichen moth caterpillars"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <i>Israel Journal of Entomology</i>. <b>49</b> (1): <span class="nowrap">1–</span>9. Archived from <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.entomology.org.il/sites/default/files/pdfs/1_Logunov_Obenauer_2019_IJE_UroballusHongKong.pdf">the original</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span> on 7 March 2022<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">7 March</span> 2022</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Israel+Journal+of+Entomology&amp;rft.atitle=A+new+species+of+Uroballus+Simon%2C+1902+%28Araneae%3A+Salticidae%29+from+Hong+Kong%2C+a+jumping+spider+that+appears+to+mimic+lichen+moth+caterpillars&amp;rft.volume=49&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E1-%3C%2Fspan%3E9&amp;rft.date=2019&amp;rft.aulast=Logunov&amp;rft.aufirst=D.V.&amp;rft.au=Obenauer%2C+S.M.&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.entomology.org.il%2Fsites%2Fdefault%2Ffiles%2Fpdfs%2F1_Logunov_Obenauer_2019_IJE_UroballusHongKong.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-643"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-643" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFEspinosaOrteaPina-Amargós2022" class="citation journal cs1 cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source">Espinosa, J.; Ortea, J.; Pina-Amargós, F. la Reina, Cuba, dedicada al cantautor cubano Pablo Milanés"</a>. <i>Avicennia</i> (in Spanish). <b>30</b>: <span class="nowrap">43–</span>46 – via ResearchGate.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Avicennia&amp;rft.atitle=Nueva+especie+del+g%C3%A9nero+Volvarina+Hinds%2C+1844+%28Mollusca%3A+Neogastropoda%29+del+Parque+Nacional+Jardines+de+la+Reina%2C+Cuba%2C+dedicada+al+cantautor+cubano+Pablo+Milan%C3%A9s&amp;rft.volume=30&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E43-%3C%2Fspan%3E46&amp;rft.date=2022&amp;rft.aulast=Espinosa&amp;rft.aufirst=J.&amp;rft.au=Ortea%2C+J.&amp;rft.au=Pina-Amarg%C3%B3s%2C+F.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.researchgate.net%2Fpublication%2F368920559&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

</li>
<li id="cite_note-Viktora21-652"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Viktora21_652-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Viktora21_652-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFViktora2021" class="citation journal cs1">Viktora, P. (2021). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://sar.fld.czu.cz/cache/article-data/SaR/Published_volumes/2021-1/155-176_viktora_kor_4.pdf">"New Asian species of <i>Xylotrechus</i> Chevrolat, 1860 (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae: Cerambycinae: Clytini)"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <i>Studies and Reports Taxonomical Series</i>. <b>17</b> (1): <span class="nowrap">155–</span>176.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Studies+and+Reports+Taxonomical+Series&amp;rft.atitle=New+Asian+species+of+Xylotrechus+Chevrolat%2C+1860+%28Coleoptera%3A+Cerambycidae%3A+Cerambycinae%3A+Clytini%29&amp;rft.volume=17&amp;rft.issue=1&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E155-%3C%2Fspan%3E176&amp;rft.date=2021&amp;rft.aulast=Viktora&amp;rft.aufirst=P.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fsar.fld.czu.cz%2Fcache%2Farticle-data%2FSaR%2FPublished_volumes%2F2021-1%2F155-176_viktora_kor_4.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-Zasphinctus-661"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Zasphinctus_661-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFHita_GarciaFischerLiuAudisio2017" class="citation journal cs1">Hita Garcia, Francisco; Fischer, Georg; Liu, Cong; Audisio, Tracy L.; Economo, Evan P. (2017). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://zookeys.pensoft.net/articles.php?id=13012">"Next-generation morphological character discovery and evaluation: an X-ray micro-CT enhanced revision of the ant genus <i>Zasphinctus</i> Wheeler (Hymenoptera, Formicidae, Dorylinae) in the Afrotropics"</a>. <i>ZooKeys</i> (693): <span class="nowrap">33–</span>93. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bibcode_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Bibcode (identifier)">Bibcode</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2017ZooK..693...33H">2017ZooK..693...33H</a>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.3897%2Fzookeys.693.13012">10.3897/zookeys.693.13012</a></span>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMC_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMC (identifier)">PMC</a>&nbsp;<span class="id-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5777420">5777420</a></span>. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29362522">29362522</a><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">27 April</span> 2021</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=ZooKeys&amp;rft.atitle=Next-generation+morphological+character+discovery+and+evaluation%3A+an+X-ray+micro-CT+enhanced+revision+of+the+ant+genus+Zasphinctus+Wheeler+%28Hymenoptera%2C+Formicidae%2C+Dorylinae%29+in+the+Afrotropics&amp;rft.issue=693&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E33-%3C%2Fspan%3E93&amp;rft.date=2017&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC5777420%23id-name%3DPMC&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F29362522&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.3897%2Fzookeys.693.13012&amp;rft_id=info%3Abibcode%2F2017ZooK..693...33H&amp;rft.aulast=Hita+Garcia&amp;rft.aufirst=Francisco&amp;rft.au=Fischer%2C+Georg&amp;rft.au=Liu%2C+Cong&amp;rft.au=Audisio%2C+Tracy+L.&amp;rft.au=Economo%2C+Evan+P.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fzookeys.pensoft.net%2Farticles.php%3Fid%3D13012&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-662"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-662" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFWhitneySchunckRegoSilveira2013" class="citation book cs1">Whitney, B.M.; Schunck, F.; Rego, M.A.; Silveira, L.F. (2013). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.researchgate.net/publication/273348956">"A new species of <i>Zimmerius</i>
 tyrannulet from the upper Madeira-Tapajos interfluvium in central 
Amazonian Brazil: birds don't always occur where they "should"<span class="cs1-kern-right"></span>"</a>. In del Hoyo, J.; Elliott, A.; Sargatal, J.; Christie, D.A. (eds.). <i>Handbook of the Birds of the World, Special Volume: New Species and Global Index</i>. Barcelona: Lynx Edicions. pp.&nbsp;<span class="nowrap">286–</span>291. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-84-96553-88-0" title="Special:BookSources/978-84-96553-88-0"><bdi>978-84-96553-88-0</bdi></a><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">30 April</span> 2021</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=bookitem&amp;rft.atitle=A+new+species+of+Zimmerius+tyrannulet+from+the+upper+Madeira-Tapajos+interfluvium+in+central+Amazonian+Brazil%3A+birds+don%27t+always+occur+where+they+%22should%22&amp;rft.btitle=Handbook+of+the+Birds+of+the+World%2C+Special+Volume%3A+New+Species+and+Global+Index&amp;rft.place=Barcelona&amp;rft.pages=%3Cspan+class%3D%22nowrap%22%3E286-%3C%2Fspan%3E291&amp;rft.pub=Lynx+Edicions&amp;rft.date=2013&amp;rft.isbn=978-84-96553-88-0&amp;rft.aulast=Whitney&amp;rft.aufirst=B.M.&amp;rft.au=Schunck%2C+F.&amp;rft.au=Rego%2C+M.A.&amp;rft.au=Silveira%2C+L.F.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.researchgate.net%2Fpublication%2F273348956&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AList+of+organisms+named+after+famous+people+%28born+1900%E2%80%931949%29" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
